info.name: KnowGo Vehicle Simulator API
info.description:
This is a simple API for interacting with the KnowGo Vehicle Simulator. It
provides mechanisms for starting/stopping the simulated vehicle, sending
notifications to the vehicle, registering webhooks, and for obtaining
detailed information and generated telemetry from the vehicle.

It further offers the ability to submit external events in order to allow
the vehicle simulation state to be synchronized with external vehicle data,
allowing the simulated vehicle to act as a digital twin upon which
additional applications and services can be modelled.

Fine-grained access to vehicle data is provided through ISO 20078
Extended Vehicle (ExVe)-compatible API endpoints.


Contact Support:
 Email: labs@adaptant.io

Simulator APIs
Webhooks
get a list of available event triggers

request.description: Obtain detailed events from the simulated vehicle in its running state.

item.name: register a new event-triggered webhook
update a registered webhook
get information about a registered webhook
unregister a webhook
start the simulated vehicle

request.description: Starts the running of the vehicle within the simulator

item.name: stop the simulated vehicle

request.description: Stops the running of the vehicle within the simulator

item.name: simulated vehicle events

request.description: Obtain detailed events from the simulated vehicle in its running state.

item.name: information about the simulated vehicle

request.description:
Obtain detailed information about the simulated vehicle and its
current state.

item.name: Send a notification to the simulated vehicle
